item.title: HackTheBox Postman Write Up
item.description: Reconnaissance Letâ€™s run a quick nmap scan as always. # nmap -sV -sC -O -oA nmap/initial 10.10.10.160 Short explanation: -sV Version detection -sC Script scan -O Enable OS detection -oA Output to all formats For a more detailed explanation click here.
